c.sp: library|Turtle Mountain Band of Chippewa Indians Tribal Code|31|31.01|31.01.010

c.x: Council" means the Turtle Mountain Band of Chippewa Tribal Council.
Reservation" means the Turtle Mountain Band of Chippewa Reservation.
"Tribal Secretary" means the secretary of the Turtle Mountain Band of Chipp
"Shorelands" means the area within the following distances from the ordinar
"Tribe" and "Tribal" means the Turtle Mountain Band of Chippewa Indians.
